SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.game

Class Main

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.example.game.Main
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Main extends javafx.application.Application implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Main.java The main file will be run the program have started. Responsible for setting the required value for the game, such as Username, Number of tiles, level, and even background color of the game, window size and etc. Controlling the main page (index page) of the program including accessing to Setting page, Leaderboard page, Exit the program, and also starting the game.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application
